name: Hide Cart & Price For Visitors Woocommerce
author: Drazen Duvnjak

sections.description: This plugin hides price and add to cart button on woocommerce shop for non registered users. It replaces it with message: “Please Register”, which links to my-account page where visitor can register.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Enjoy

short_description: This plugin hides price and add to cart button on woocommerce shop for non registered users.
